Class CrewMemberImages

  • java.lang.Object
    • backendGUIExtensions.CrewMemberImages

extends Object
    Allows for the fetching of images for crew member

      • fetchImages

        public static void fetchImages()
                        throws IOException,
                               FileNotFoundException
        Fetches all crew images from the resource folder and loads them
        Throws:

        FileNotFoundException - if no default image is found
